page.title: 11COTTAGE STUDY
page.content:
The cottages in the area surrounding the Lochans were studied to discover their use and the occupations of the inhabitants. The majority of the cottages were privately owned and although they were situated in a farming community surprisingly few were used as farm cottages. These cottages were probably built for use as farm cottages and have been bought and renovated for the use of people who live in the area and commute to Stranraer to work.
A good example of this is{COLFIN {COTTAGE}where the lady works as a nurse in Stranraer and her husband works on the ferry also at Stranraer.
